meta.title: From MOLASSES to DAY
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: In 2019, Setec Astronomy ran a hunt that began as a commemoration of the (very real) [Great Molasses Flood of 1919](https://www.history.com/articles/the-great-molasses-flood-of-1919), and evolved into a trek through a [Holiday Forest](https://puzzles.mit.edu/2019/). The coin was found by Left Out.
